summary.span: 表示 控件中的节点。

span.span: Represents a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件由节点组成。The control is made up of nodes. 树中的每个条目称为节点，由 对象表示。Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a object. 包含其他节点的节点称为 *父节点*。A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*. 其他节点包含的节点称为 *子节点*。A node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*. 没有子节点的节点称为 *叶节点*。A node that has no child nodes is called a *leaf node*. 不是由任何其他节点包含的节点，而是其他所有*节点的上级节点。*A node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*. 节点可以是父节点和子节点，但根节点、父节点和叶节点都是互斥的。A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive. 节点的多个视觉和行为属性由节点是 *根*节点、 *父*节点还是 *叶* 节点确定。Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a *root*, *parent*, or *leaf* node. 尽管典型树只有一个根节点，但该 控件允许您将多个根节点添加到树结构。Although a typical tree has only one root node, the control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure. 如果希望在不显示单个主根节点的情况下显示项列表，则这非常有用，如在产品类别列表中。This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single main root node, as in a list of product categories. 节点主要将数据存储在两个属性中： 属性和 属性。A node primarily stores data in two properties, the property and the property. 属性的值 显示在 控件中， 属性用于存储关于节点的任何其他数据，如用于处理回发事件的数据。The value of the property is displayed in the control, and the property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events. 节点还将从节点到其根节点的路径存储在属性中 。A node also stores the path from the node to its root node in the property. 属性指示节点相对于根节点的位置。The property indicates the node's position relative to the root node. > [!NOTE] > 对于同一级别的节点，每个节点都必须具有唯一的 属性值; 控件不能区分同一级别上具有相同值的不同节点。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在这种情况下，如果用户单击具有重复值的节点，则会选择该控件中的第一个节点 。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. 对象由以下四个用户界面组成 (UI) 元素，这些元素可自定义或隐藏：A object is made up of the following four user interface (UI) elements, which can be customized or hidden: - 用于显示节点是展开、折叠还是不展开的展开节点指示器图标。An expansion node indicator icon used to show whether the node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable. - 与节点关联的可选复选框。An optional check box associated with the node. - 可选的节点映像。An optional node image. - 节点文本。The node text. 可以通过设置 类的、和属性，为可展开、可折叠且不可展开的节点指示器指定自定义图像 。You can specify a custom image for the expandable, collapsible, and non-expandable node indicators by setting the , , and properties of the class. 通过将类的属性设置为，甚至可以完全隐藏展开节点的指示符图标 `false` 。The expansion node indicator icons can even be hidden entirely by setting the property of the class to `false`. 若要在节点旁边显示复选框，请设置 类的属性 。To display a check box next to a node, set the property of the class. 如果 将属性设置为以外的值，则 `TreeNodeType.Node` 复选框将显示在指定节点类型的旁边。When the property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeType.Node`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node type. 通过设置节点的属性，可以有选择地重写单个节点的复选框 。You can selectively override the check box of an individual node by setting the node's property. 显示复选框时，请使用 属性来确定复选框是否处于选中状态。When a check box is displayed, use the property to determine whether the check box is selected. 可以通过设置属性在节点中显示图像 。You can display an image in a node by setting the property. 此图像显示在节点文本旁。This image is displayed next to the node text. 控件中节点的文本 可以是以下两种模式之一：选择模式或导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要使节点进入导航模式，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串以外的值 ( "" ) 。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要将节点置于选择模式下，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串。To put a node into selection mode, set the node's property to an empty string. > [!NOTE] > 某些 Internet 浏览器有可能会影响控件性能的限制 。Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the control. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 的 URL 字符限制为2067个字符。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts. 如果节点 URL 中的字符数大于该数量，则展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown. 默认情况下，单击处于选择模式的节点会将该页回发到服务器并引发 事件。By default, clicking a node that is in selection mode posts the page back to the server and raises the event. 您可以选择通过设置节点的属性来指定要引发的其他事件 `SelectAction` 。You can optionally specify a different event to raise by setting the node's `SelectAction` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 若要确定在选择模式下单击的节点，请使用 控件的属性 。To determine which node was clicked in selection mode, use the property of the control. 当某个节点处于导航模式时，将对该节点禁用所有选择事件。When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node. 单击导航模式下的节点会将用户定向到指定的 URL。Clicking the node in navigation mode directs the user to the specified URL. 您可以选择将 属性设置为指定要在其中显示链接内容的窗口或框架。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. 类包含多个用于存储节点状态的属性。The class contains several properties that are used to store the state of the node. 使用 属性来确定节点是否处于选中状态。Use the property to determine whether a node is selected. 若要确定节点是否已展开，请使用 属性。To determine whether the node is expanded, use the property. 属性用于确定节点是否绑定到数据。The property is used to determine whether a node is bound to data. 将节点绑定到数据时，可以使用属性访问基础数据项 。When a node is bound to data, you can access the underlying data item by using the property. 类提供多个属性，这些属性可帮助确定节点相对于树中的其他节点的位置。The class provides several properties that help to determine the position of a node relative to other nodes in the tree. 使用 属性来确定节点的深度。Use the property to determine the depth of the node. 通过使用属性，可以获取从当前节点到其根节点的分隔节点列表 。You can get the delimited list of nodes from the current node to its root node by using the property. 若要确定节点的父节点，请使用 属性。To determine the node's parent node, use the property. 使用集合访问子节点 。Child nodes are accessed using the collection. 有时，由于数据大小或自定义内容依赖于用户输入而导致静态预定义树结构是不切实际的。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 展开节点时，可以在运行时填充该节点。A node can be populated at run time when it is expanded. 请注意，如果保持异步创建的节点，则会出现意外行为。Note that you can get unexpected behavior if you persist asynchronously created nodes. 例如，如果你使用后台工作线程异步填充节点，则在该控件继续执行页面生命周期的其余部分时，可能不会立即填充节点树。For example, if you use a background worker thread to populate nodes asynchronously, the node tree might not be populated immediately though the control proceeds with the rest of the page life cycle. 在回发时，延迟创建节点可能导致在控件的视图状态加载但未完全填充节点树时出现问题。On postback, the delayed creation of the nodes can cause problems when the control's view state is loaded but the node tree is not fully populated. 有关动态节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 属性。For more information on dynamic node population, see the property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一个代码示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用声明性语法 在控件中创建对象 。The following code example demonstrates how to use declarative syntax to create objects in the control. 此示例在上一示例的框架集中用于显示目录。This example is used within the frameset of the previous example to display a table of contents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当节点显示复选框时， 属性通常用于指定是否选中复选框。When a node displays a check box, the property is commonly used to specify whether the check box is selected. 如果选择了与节点关联的复选框，则会自动将该节点添加到 控件的集合中 。When the check box associated with a node is selected, the node is automatically added to the collection of the control. 属性还可用于确定复选框是否处于选中状态。The property can also be used to determine whether the check box is selected. > [!NOTE] > 更常见的情况是，通过循环访问集合来确定控件中的哪些节点 选中其复选框 。It is more common to determine which nodes in the control have their check boxes selected by iterating through the collection. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定节点的复选框是否处于选中状态。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify whether a node's check box is selected. 它初始化深度为1到选定状态的节点的复选框。It initializes the check boxes of nodes with a depth of one to a selected state. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Newsgroup.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Newsgroup.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeChecked#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeChecked/CS/treenodecheckedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeChecked#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeChecked/VB/treenodecheckedvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取一个 集合，其中包含当前节点的第一级子节点。Use the property to get a collection that contains the first-level child nodes of the current node. 此集合通常用于循环访问所有第一级子节点，或访问当前节点的特定第一级子节点。This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the first-level child nodes, or to access a specific first-level child node of the current node. 属性还可用于以编程方式管理当前节点中的第一级子节点。The property can also be used to programmatically manage the first-level child nodes in the current node. 可以添加、插入、删除和检索 集合中的对象。You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve objects from the collection. 下一次刷新页面时，对集合的任何更新都会自动反映在 控件中。Any updates to the collection will automatically be reflected in the control the next time the page is refreshed. 若要在树中进一步向下访问子节点，请使用 下一级子节点的属性向下导航节点级别。To access child nodes further down the tree, use the property of the next-level child node to navigate down the node levels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性遍历树。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to traverse the tree. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否展开节点。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node is expanded.

value.span: 如果已展开节点，则为 ；如果尚未展开节点，则为 或 。

span.span: if the node is expanded, if the node is not expanded, or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定节点是否已展开。Use the property to specify or determine whether the node is expanded. 您可以通过分别调用和方法来展开和折叠节点 。You can expand and collapse a node by calling the and methods, respectively. 还可以通过分别调用和方法展开和折叠节点及其所有子节点 。You can also expand and collapse a node and all its child nodes by calling the and methods, respectively. 由于 属性是三状态属性，以下 c # 代码段会导致编译错误：Since the property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error: ``` protected void TreeView1_SelectedNodeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { if (TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded) { // some work here } } ``` 尽管 VB.Net 将值隐式转换 `Boolean` 为 `NullableBoolean` ，但 c # 却不能。While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not. 因此，最佳做法是显式检查属性的状态。Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property. 例如，Visual Basic 和 c # 中的以下代码示例显式测试属性的值 。For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the property. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码示例显式测试属性的值 。The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否 将属性设置为 `True` ; 因此 `Nothing` ，和 `False` 贯穿 `If` 语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` If TreeView1.Nodes(0).Expanded = True Then 'some work hereEnd IF ``` 此 c # 代码示例显式测试属性的值 。This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否 将属性设置为 `True` ; 因此 `Null` ，和 `False` 贯穿 `If` 语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` if( TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded == true ) { //some work here} ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式展开节点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically expand a node. 它将深度为1的所有节点初始化为展开状态。It initializes all nodes with a depth of one to an expanded state. 请注意，当根节点展开时，它的子节点已经展开。Notice that when the root node is expanded, its child nodes are already expanded. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Book.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeExpanded#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeExpanded/CS/treenodeexpandedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeExpanded#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeExpanded/VB/treenodeexpandedvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ```
```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点的文本可以是以下两种模式之一：选择模式或导航模式。The text of a node can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要使节点进入导航模式，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串以外的值。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string. 当某个节点处于导航模式时，将对该节点禁用所有选择事件。When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node. 单击导航模式下的节点会将用户链接到指定的 URL。Clicking the node in navigation mode links the user to the specified URL. 您可以选择将 属性设置为指定要在其中显示链接内容的窗口或框架。You can optionally set the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一个代码示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时，由于数据大小或自定义内容依赖于用户输入而导致静态预定义树结构是不切实际的。Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input. 因此， 控件支持动态节点填充。Because of this, the control supports dynamic node population. 当节点的 属性设置为时 `true` ，该节点将在运行时通过回发事件在节点展开时填充。When a node's property is set to `true`, that node is populated at run time through a postback event when the node is expanded. 若要动态填充节点，必须为事件定义填充节点的事件处理方法 。To populate a node dynamically, an event-handling method that populates the node must be defined for the event. 支持的浏览器还可利用客户端节点填充。Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population. 启用此功能后，控件可以在该 节点展开时在客户端上动态填充节点，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。When enabled, this allows the control to dynamically populate a node on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server. 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on client-side node population, see . 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指示动态填充节点。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that a node is populated dynamically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件中节点的文本 可以是以下两种模式之一：选择模式或导航模式。The text of a node in the control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode. 默认情况下，节点处于选择模式。By default, a node is in selection mode. 若要使节点进入导航模式，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串以外的值 ( "" ) 。To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's property to a value other than an empty string (""). 若要将节点置于选择模式下，请将节点的 属性设置为空字符串。To put a node into selection mode, set the node's property to an empty string. > [!NOTE] > 当某个节点处于导航模式时，将对该节点禁用选择事件。When a node is in navigation mode, selection events are disabled for that node. 单击节点会将用户定向到指定的 URL，而不是将该页面回发到服务器并引发事件。Clicking a node will direct the user to the specified URL, rather than posting the page back to the server and raising an event. 当节点处于选择模式时，请使用 属性来指定在选择节点时引发的事件。When a node is in selection mode, use the property to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected. 下表列出了可用的选项。The following table lists the available options. |选择操作Selection action|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Expand`|在展开和折叠之间切换节点。Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed. 适当地引发事件或 事件。Raises the event or the event as appropriate.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`|在选定节点时不引发任何事件。Raises no events when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.Select`|在选定节点时引发 事件。Raises the event when a node is selected.| |`TreeNodeSelectAction.SelectExpand`|在 选定节点时引发和事件。Raises both the and the events when a node is selected. 节点只展开，从不折叠。Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > 对于其属性设置为的节点，不呈现属性 `TreeNodeSelectAction.None` 。The property is not rendered for a node with its property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在单击节点时引发的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/CS/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPopulateNodesFromClient/VB/treeviewpopulatenodesfromclientvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: to display the check box; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件允许您在节点的图像旁显示复选框。The control allows you to display a check box next to a node's image. 使用 属性可显示或隐藏当前节点的复选框。Use the property to show or hide the check box for the current node. 尽管 属性可用于显示复选框，但更常见的情况是使用 控件的属性 。Although the property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the property of the control. 但是，属性会影响属性指定的每个节点类型，因此， 属性通常用于替代单个节点的设置。The property, however, affects every node type specified by the property; therefore, the property is often used to override that setting for an individual node. 由于 属性是三状态属性，以下 c # 代码段会导致编译错误：Since the property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error: ``` protected void TreeView1_SelectedNodeChanged(object sender, EventArgs e) { if (TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded) { // some work here } } ``` 尽管 VB.Net 将值隐式转换 `Boolean` 为 `NullableBoolean` ，但 c # 却不能。While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not. 因此，最佳做法是显式检查属性的状态。Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property. 例如，Visual Basic 和 c # 中的以下代码示例显式测试属性的值 。For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the property. 下面的 Visual Basic 代码示例显式测试属性的值 。The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否 将属性设置为 `True` ; 因此 `Nothing` ，和 `False` 贯穿 `If` 语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` If TreeView1.Nodes(0).Expanded = True Then 'some work hereEnd IF ``` 此 c # 代码示例显式测试属性的值 。This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the property. 此示例测试是否 将属性设置为 `True` ; 因此 `Null` ，和 `False` 贯穿 `If` 语句。This example tests if the property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement. ``` if( TreeView1.Nodes[0].Expanded == true ) { //some work here} ``` 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以编程方式显示和隐藏控件中节点的复选框 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically show and hide the check box for a node in the control. 要使此示例正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到名为 Book.xml 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeShowCheckBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeShowCheckBox/CS/treenodeshowcheckboxcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeShowCheckBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeShowCheckBox/VB/treenodeshowcheckboxvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是上一示例的示例 XML 数据。The following code is sample XML data for the previous example. ```
```

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 " 属性" 指定在单击节点时要在其中显示链接到该节点的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a node when that node is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将重写 控件的属性 。Setting this property overrides the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为 `target` 属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target` `anchor` XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果对象的呈现输出 必须符合 XHTML 1.1，请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the object must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/exc57y7e(v=vs.100)). > > 创建可访问的网页时，强烈建议你避免使用 属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms228011(v=vs.100)). 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一个示例的帧。The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/CS/framecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameSet/VB/framevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要在其中显示链接内容的框架。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the frame in which to display the linked content. 此示例在上一示例的框架集中用于显示目录。This example is used within the frameset of the previous example to display a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/CS/treeviewframecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewFrameExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewFrameExample/VB/treeviewframevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于存储有关节点的任何其他数据（如用于处理回发事件的数据）的非显示值。

span.span: Gets or sets a non-displayed value used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events.

value.span: 与节点有关并且不会显示的补充数据。

span.span: Supplemental data about the node that is not displayed.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于 通过存储与节点关联的任何附加数据来补充属性。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the node. 此值不会显示在控件中，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件的数据。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性包含 `null` ，则 `get` 访问器返回属性的值 。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果 属性又包含 `null` ， 则返回。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. > [!NOTE] > 对于同一级别的节点，每个节点都必须具有唯一的 属性值; 控件不能区分同一级别上具有相同值的不同节点。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在这种情况下，如果用户单击具有重复值的节点，则会选择该控件中的第一个节点 。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来存储键字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to store the key field. summary.span: 获取从根节点到当前节点的路径。

span.span: Gets the path from the root node to the current node.

value.span: 由分隔符分隔的节点值列表，这些值构成从根节点到当前节点的路径。

span.span: A delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含以分隔符分隔的节点值列表，这些值构成从根节点到当前节点的路径。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node. 使用 属性指定分隔节点值时所用的分隔符字符。Use the property to specify the delimiter character used to separate the node values. 此值通常在分析各个值的列表时使用，或者作为参数传递给 类的方法 。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values, or to pass as an argument to the method of the class. 根据控件中显示的值 ，分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。Depending on the value displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果将分隔符字符设置为逗号，则显示的值不应包含任何逗号;否则，将无法准确分析 属性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed value should not contain any commas; otherwise, you cannot accurately parse the property. > [!NOTE] > 对于同一级别的节点，每个节点都必须具有唯一的 属性值; 控件不能区分同一级别上具有相同值的不同节点。Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value. 在这种情况下，如果用户单击具有重复值的节点，则会选择该控件中的第一个节点 。In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the control is selected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何分析 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to parse the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/CS/treeviewpathseparatorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewPathSeparator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewPathSeparator2/VB/treeviewpathseparatorvb.aspx#1)]
